kmerFilters 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Counting kmers

    count_seq_kmers.Rd

    This function is a wrapper for seqR counters

    count_seq_kmers(sequences, alphabet, n = 4, d = 6)

    Arguments

    sequences

    input data for k-mer counting

    alphabet

    elements used to generate a motif

    n

    maximum number of alphabet elements

    d

    number of possible gaps

    Examples

    n_seq <- 20
sequence_length <- 10
alph <- letters[1:6]
motifs <- generate_motifs(alph, 3, 3, 3, 2)
seq_data <- generate_sequence_data(n_seq, sequence_length, alph, motifs, 1)
count_seq_kmers(seq_data, alph)
